front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Bridges and Bridged Networks Amendment: YANG Data Model for Connectivity Fault Management

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: YANG data model that supports configuration, status reporting, and monitoring for Connectivity Fault Management (CFM) for Two-Port MAC Relays, Customer VLAN Bridges, and Provider Bridges is further developed by this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q™-2018. See also IEEE Std 802.1Qcp™-2018 for the introduction of this YANG data model.
